summary: Digital gaming account marketplace where admins manage product listings (mobile gaming accounts, in-game currency, premium clothes) through an admin panel. Buyers must create accounts via Internet Identity to purchase. Payment methods: PayPal, UK gift cards, and crypto with admin-configured payment info. Products include game name, price in GBP, images, and quantity. Multiple game categories supported. AI-generated GamerTag-style usernames replace manual creation.
architectural_notes: Motoko backend on Internet Computer platform
React + TypeScript frontend with Tailwind CSS
Internet Identity for secure buyer authentication
Manual payment processing with admin-configured payment instructions
Product types: gaming accounts with ranks, in-game currency, premium clothes
Login queue: random countdown 20-60 for all users, auto-proceeds to username creation (new) or store (returning)
Social media links: YouTube and Instagram icons at bottom of queue and store pages
AI-generated GamerTag-style usernames replace manual username creation

existing_features.title: Implement user authentication system using Internet Identity for buyer accounts
Build admin panel interface accessible only to admin users for creating, editing, and deleting product listings
Create public storefront interface displaying all products organized by game categories with product cards showing game name, product type, price in GBP, image, and available quantity
Implement shopping cart functionality where authenticated buyers can add products to cart, view cart contents, and adjust quantities
Build checkout flow that displays payment instructions for three payment methods: PayPal, UK gift cards, and crypto, using payment details configured by admins
Create payment configuration section in admin panel where admins can input and update payment details for PayPal, UK gift cards, and crypto
Implement game category system where admins can create, edit, and delete game categories, and assign products to categories

Design a bold, gaming-inspired visual theme with vibrant accent colors (avoiding blue and purple), modern typography suitable for a marketplace, and a layout that emphasizes product imagery and clear calls-to-action throughout the storefront and admin panel
Render generated images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated including hero banner and category icons
Create username creation modal component that appears immediately after Internet Identity authentication for users who do not have a username, blocking access to the store until username is created

Implement login queue system that applies to all users (new and returning) during sign-up/login, displaying a countdown from a random number between 20 and 60 that decrements automatically until reaching 0

Configure queue system to automatically proceed users to username creation (if they haven't created a username) or directly to full store access (if they already have a username) when queue countdown reaches 0
Update the LoginQueue component to generate a random starting countdown between 20 seconds and 5 minutes (instead of 20-60 seconds)
Modify the LoginQueue component so each countdown decrement occurs at a random interval between 20 seconds and 5 minutes, rather than decrementing every second
Generate a custom animated video background that resembles dynamic gameplay footage for the login queue screen

Add YouTube and Instagram social media icons at the bottom of the LoginQueue component, with YouTube linking to https://youtube.com/@fros7yyt?si=u4-j8LrTkNuj7wUo and Instagram URL configurable by admin
Add YouTube and Instagram social media icons at the bottom of the storefront page, with YouTube linking to https://youtube.com/@fros7yyt?si=u4-j8LrTkNuj7wUo and Instagram URL configurable by admin
Add Instagram URL field to the payment configuration section in the admin panel so admins can configure the Instagram link displayed on the queue and store pages

Add 'Skip Queue for £0.05' button to the LoginQueue component that opens a payment submission dialog showing payment instructions for all three existing payment methods (PayPal, UK gift cards, and crypto) using the admin-configured payment details
Create payment proof submission form in the queue skip dialog that allows users to submit a screenshot/image file and a transaction ID text field as proof of payment

Upon successful submission of payment proof, automatically grant the user queue bypass status and immediately proceed them to username creation (if they haven't created a username) or directly to the storefront (if they already have a username) without waiting for admin approval
Add 'Queue Skip Price' configuration field to the payment configuration section in the admin panel with a default value of £0.05, allowing admins to adjust the queue skip price

Create admin panel section to view all queue skip payment submissions with details including user principal, submission timestamp, transaction ID, payment screenshot, and current status (pending review/approved/flagged as fraudulent)
Implement admin actions to flag queue skip submissions as fraudulent, which should revoke the user's queue bypass status and prevent them from using the queue skip feature again
Add UK gift card type selection dropdown to the queue skip payment form with common UK gift card options (e.g., Amazon UK, Google Play UK, iTunes UK, Steam UK, PlayStation UK, Xbox UK)
Replace the screenshot/image upload field with a text input field for gift card code entry in the queue skip payment form when UK gift cards payment method is selected
Hardcode the Bitcoin address bc1q9jqngrwkpay42hvdmcl2lnyh3y4fx7l7ufh722 to always display for queue skip crypto payments, regardless of admin-configured crypto payment details

Update the admin queue skip submissions panel to display gift card type and gift card code for gift card submissions instead of screenshot, while continuing to show screenshots for PayPal and crypto submissions

Create a terms acceptance modal component that displays after queue completion or queue skip payment, showing the text 'We at Game Vault have no partition with any hacking or scamming or 3rd party selling' with an Accept button that must be clicked to proceed
Implement AI-generated GamerTag-style username creation that automatically generates usernames (format examples: ShadowWarrior42, EpicSniper89) immediately after terms acceptance without user input
Add username regeneration feature that allows users to request a new AI-generated GamerTag for £0.01 per change
Add username regeneration price configuration field (£0.01) in admin payment settings panel alongside queue skip price
Create admin panel section to review username change payment submissions with details including user principal, submission timestamp, transaction details, and current status
Remove the existing manual username creation modal (UsernameSetup.tsx) and update App.tsx authentication flow to use terms acceptance followed by AI username generation
Update AIUsernameGenerator component to handle duplicate usernames seamlessly in the background by automatically retrying generation without displaying retry indicators or loading states to the user
Add 'Make Your Own' button priced at £0.10 to the AIUsernameGenerator component (initial username generation screen after terms acceptance) that opens a custom username input form

Add 'Make Your Own' button priced at £0.10 to the UsernameRegenerationDialog component (username regeneration screen) alongside the existing £0.01 regenerate option that opens a custom username input form

Create custom username input form that allows users who paid £0.10 to enter their own username with validation: alphanumeric characters only, minimum 5 characters, profanity filter, and uniqueness check

Integrate custom username payment flow supporting all three existing payment methods (PayPal, UK gift cards with type selection and code entry, and crypto with hardcoded Bitcoin address bc1q9jqngrwkpay42hvdmcl2lnyh3y4fx7l7ufh722) for the £0.10 custom username feature
Add 'Custom Username Price' configuration field (default £0.10) to the admin payment configuration panel alongside existing queue skip and username regeneration price fields

Add admin panel section to review custom username payment submissions with details including user principal, submission timestamp, requested custom username, payment details, and actions to approve or flag fraudulent submissions
Add admin button to storefront page that is visible to all authenticated users
Implement frontend username whitelist check that queries backend when admin button is clicked
Navigate to existing admin panel if username is whitelisted, otherwise display access denied message
Create React Query hook for checking admin whitelist status using the backend endpoint

new_feature_requests.summary: Public storefront for browsing mobile gaming products by category
User authentication with Internet Identity for buyers
Admin panel for product listing management (create/edit/delete)
Product listings with game name, price (GBP), images, quantity, and product type
Shopping cart and checkout system
Payment configuration in admin panel for PayPal, UK gift cards, and crypto
Game category organization system

Create backend data model for products with fields: game name (text), product type (enum: account/currency/clothes), price in GBP (decimal), image URLs (array), quantity available (number), and game category
Implement admin-only access control where only designated admin principals can create and manage product listings
Queue system for all sign-up/login with random countdown from 20-60, automatic progression to username creation or store access
Extend the backend user profile data model to include a username field that is unique across all users, alphanumeric only, and minimum 5 characters long
Implement profanity filter validation on the backend to reject usernames containing offensive or rude words

Create backend endpoint for username creation that accepts a username, validates it against all requirements (unique, length, alphanumeric, profanity), and associates it with the authenticated user's principal
Add backend query endpoint to check if a user has completed username creation, returning username status for the authenticated principal
Update queue system: random starting countdown from 20 seconds to 5 minutes, each countdown number decrements at random intervals (20 seconds to 5 minutes per step)
Add animated gaming background video to login queue screen
Add social media icons (YouTube and Instagram) at the bottom of both queue screen and store page with configurable URLs

Add 'Skip Queue' feature: button on queue screen with £0.05 configurable price, payment via existing methods (PayPal, UK gift cards, crypto), users submit payment proof (screenshot/transaction ID) for automatic queue bypass
Admin panel section to review queue skip payment submissions and flag fraudulent attempts
Backend endpoint to handle queue skip payment proof submissions and automatically grant queue bypass access
Add configurable 'Queue Skip Price' field in admin panel (default £0.05)

Implement backend endpoint to receive queue skip payment proof submissions including screenshot image data and transaction ID, storing submission details associated with the user's principal for admin review
Update queue skip payment flow: keep all 3 payment methods, add UK gift card type selection dropdown and gift card code text input (replacing screenshot upload for gift cards)
Hardcode Bitcoin address bc1q9jqngrwkpay42hvdmcl2lnyh3y4fx7l7ufh722 to always display for queue skip crypto payments
Update the backend queue skip submission data model to store gift card type and gift card code fields instead of requiring screenshot data for gift card submissions

Replace manual username creation with terms acceptance screen displaying 'We at Game Vault have no partition with any hacking or scamming or 3rd party selling' and Accept button after queue completion/skip
Implement AI-generated GamerTag-style usernames (e.g., ShadowWarrior42, EpicSniper89) automatically created after terms acceptance
Add username regeneration feature allowing users to request new AI-generated username for £0.01 per change using existing payment methods (PayPal, UK gift cards, crypto)
Add backend endpoint to generate AI-powered GamerTag-style usernames with validation against existing usernames, profanity filter, and uniqueness checks
Optimize AI username generation backend to achieve sub-second response time (fixing 10-minute delay)
Add 'Make Your Own' custom username button (£0.10) on both initial username generation screen and username regeneration screen with text input and same validation rules
Optimize the backend AI username generation endpoint to achieve sub-second response time, replacing the current implementation that causes 10-minute delays when generating GamerTag-style usernames

Create backend submission tracking system for custom username payment proofs with fields for user principal, submission timestamp, custom username requested, payment method, transaction details (screenshot/transaction ID or gift card type/code), and status
Add admin button on storefront page with username-based whitelist access control
Add backend storage for admin username whitelist that can be updated programmatically
Create backend endpoint to check if a given username exists in the admin whitelist
Add 'venomgladiator25' to admin username whitelist
Add the username 'venomgladiator25' to the admin username whitelist in the backend, enabling full admin panel access for this user when they click the admin button on the storefront
Add the username 'turbohunter64' to the backend admin username whitelist alongside the existing 'venomgladiator25' username
